package.name: EasyDialer
package.shortDescription: Easy Dial with T9 Search Functionality.

descriptionlist.description: Easy Dial with T9 Search Functionality.

Developped on iPhone 7 iOS 11.3.1. It should work well on iOS 9+, which use CNContact framework. It is integrated with native phone.app with additional options in preference. It supports English and Mandarin Chinese.

changelog.change: 0.0.7-1+debug: update for iOS13. Verified on iPhone8 iOS13.3. Lower iOS should use old version.
0.0.6-19+debug: fixed an internal logical issue. Verified on iPhone8 iOS12.4
1. tap bottom right Keypad TAB to activate T9 keypad to input.
2. long-press Keypad TAB to switch EasyDialer and native dialer.
3. support to add T9 Key character for Turkish/Russian.
0.0.3-1+debug: Add Recent Call View when searchbar is empty.
1. Support Russian Contacts; add organization field. Features donated by Сергей Инок.
2. Correct show-up of Chinese Contact, should be same as dock Contacts.app.
3. Improve stability when launching Phone.app (w/ enabling replace dock Keypad).
